title: The developer shall have to pay premium as an unearned income equal to 30% of sale value of interchanged BUA of Sale component as per ASR
clause_text: The developer shall have to pay premium as an unearned income equal to 30% of sale value of interchanged BUA of Sale component as per ASR . Provided further that, if Scheme under this Regulation is clubbed with Scheme under clause 3.11 of Regulation 33(10) or 33(11),
section: Payments to be made to SRA and Instalments:
